name: Artificial Island
uniques: Must be adjacent to [1] to [6] [Coast] tiles
Occurs on latitudes from [10] to [70] percent of distance equator to pole
Only [Citadel] improvements may be built on this tile

civilopediaText.text: Before the Cataclysm, a belligerent empire attempted to illegally exercise sovereignty over international waters by constructing artificial islands and building military bases and airstrips on them. Though now devoid of any signs of the fallen empire's presence, the island itself endures.

name: Pristine Lake
uniques: Occurs on latitudes from [20] to [60] percent of distance equator to pole
Occurs in groups of [2] to [2] tiles
